content: Gary did a fantastic job. He promptly returned my initial phone call and had reasonable pricing (I called some other well known arborists but they were too busy to even return my calls- and others were booked months out). When I asked Gary questions about my mature pear and camellia trees, he had very knowledgable advice about their growth behavior, which I appreciated. Lastly, he showed up on time and got the job done very efficiently. Cleaned up all the mess before he left too! Will be calling for all my future tree trimming and pruning needs.
name: Emily L.

content: Very friendly and knowledgable! Punctual and got the job done right. I appreciated the safety measures they took and their work ethic. I'll definitely be using them again when I need more tree work done!
name: Marcos F.

content: Every time I've called for service they're here in just a few days. They are hard working,  thorough, honest and friendly! We highly recommend using Malkuch Tree Service!
name: S C.
